OwnerUser.AboutMe: I enjoy dabbling in languages. I almost know one language, that's English, my mother tongue. I have a constructed language I've been working on with friends for a couple years now, we have it going pretty well. I was homeschooled, that's how I've had time to construct a language. I'm an amateur to linguistics though.

Body: Historically most words were probably adopted from the community rather than a single person, but initially I think every word has to have a single originator, except if the word is adopted from another language. Faster communication in modern times allows us to see the correlation between the charismatic originator and his neologisms.
